name: Ecosystem Simulation (claireyuke)
description:
This is a project about Ecosystem Simulation and Procedural Village Generation. The project simulates a wildlife forest, where players will observe the daily life, reproduction, and hunting of various animals with a third person perspective and grow plants to feed the animals. Meanwhile, players can also choose to experience different weather here. In addition to the forest, there is also a procedural village generation. There are different farm animals in the village. Players can change the construction parameters of the village and experience the feeling of living with animals.

Use WASD to control the player.
